video.title: Jordan Klepper Solves Guns
video.series_description: America is divided - but that's not stopping cocksure ideologue, Jordan Klepper, from solving America's most divisive issue: guns.
video.season_description: America is divided - but that's not stopping cocksure ideologue, Jordan Klepper, from solving America's most divisive issue: guns.
video.episode_short_description: America is divided - but that's not stopping cocksure ideologue, Jordan Klepper, from solving America's most divisive issue: guns.
video.episode_long_description: America is divided - but that's not stopping cocksure ideologue, Jordan Klepper, from solving America's most divisive issue: guns. While understanding the gun debate, Jordan has pancakes with Cory Booker; goes glamping with the Georgia Militia; gets an MRI to analyze the political brain; shoots big guns with a former Special Ops trainer; and even hires a lobbyist to try and sway the mind of his conservative cousin. Anything to complete the very doable task of solving guns.
video.actors_display: Jordan Klepper, Jordan Klepper, Todd Bieber, Steve Bodow, Kirsten Ames, Diane Fitzgerald
